badTypeArguments.js(4,13): error TS8010: Type annotations can only be used in TypeScript files.


==== dummyType.d.ts (0 errors) ====
    declare class C<T> { t: T }
    
==== badTypeArguments.js (1 errors) ====
    /** @param {C.<>} x */
    /** @param {C.<number,>} y */
    // @ts-ignore
    /** @param {C.<number,>} skipped */
                ~~~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS8010: Type annotations can only be used in TypeScript files.
    function f(x, y, skipped) {
        return x.t + y.t;
    }
    var x = f({ t: 1000 }, { t: 3000 }, { t: 5000 });
